channel.title: Ethereal Pk 317 RSPS New Need Staff Torva/Chaotics and more
channel.description:
[center][size=16pt]Welcome to Ethereal Pk![/size][/center]
[center]This server is brand new and in need of players and staff. [/center]
[center][size=15pt]Features List:[/size][/center] [center]-317 server with perfect switching NO LAG[/center] [center]-Have items such as Torva/Pernix/Virtus, Claws, AGS, VLS, and many more all with working specs! [/center] [center]-Summoning works 100%[/center] [center]-Chaotics obtainable through the pkp system which also has many high value rewards[/center] [center]-Very friendly owner online. I'm open to suggestions for anything and if anyone online wants an event than it shall be done![/center]
[center][size=15pt]Downloads:[/size][/center]
[center]Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?t3wmg654nymu31g [/center]
[center][size=15pt]Staff Positions:[/size][/center]
[center]Owner: David[/center]
[center]Administrator: Vacant[/center] [center]Administrator: Vacant[/center]
[center]Moderator: Vacant[/center] [center]Moderator: Vacant[/center]
To become staff, being the few that come in the server first would help a lot. Also you must be friendly and preferably experienced with the game.
Well hope to see a couple of people in game! Enjoy ;D ;D ;D ;D

item.title: Ethereal Pk 317 RSPS New Need Staff Torva/Chaotics and more
item.dc:creator: @EtherealPk EtherealPk
item.description:
@EtherealPk wrote:

[quote=“CiTyWoK, post:2, topic:456708”][quote author=EtherealPk link=topic=559644.msg4088669#msg4088669 date=1346113493]
[center][size=16pt]Welcome to Ethereal Pk![/size][/center]

[center]This server is brand new and in need of players and staff. [/center]

[center][size=15pt]Features List:[/size][/center]
[center]-317 server with perfect switching NO LAG[/center]
[center]-Have items such as Torva/Pernix/Virtus, Claws, AGS, VLS, and many more all with working specs! [/center]
[center]-Summoning works 100%[/center]
[center]-Chaotics obtainable through the pkp system which also has many high value rewards[/center]
[center]-Very friendly owner online. I’m open to suggestions for anything and if anyone online wants an event than it shall be done![/center]

[center][size=15pt]Downloads:[/size][/center]

[center]Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?t3wmg654nymu31g
[/center]

[center][size=15pt]Staff Positions:[/size][/center]

[center]Owner: David[/center]

[center]Administrator: Vacant[/center]
[center]Administrator: Vacant[/center]

[center]Moderator: Vacant[/center]
[center]Moderator: Vacant[/center]

To become staff, being the few that come in the server first would help a lot. Also you must be friendly and preferably experienced with the game.

Well hope to see a couple of people in game! Enjoy ;D ;D ;D ;D

[/quote]

kk, Everything i have read is not special in any way. Also, add media because clearly you also failed to add good info.And if you don’t have a forums or webclient you are already screwed. Why don’t people know this…[/quote]

Your absolutely right and I do apologize for the lack of good info/forums/webclient. But I am a little new to this and gotta learn one way or the other. but your comment gives good criticism so thank you.

Read full topic
